short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZAKKU by 6551.XYZ, Bring Your NFT to Metaverse with ERC6551

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Token-Bound Account (TBA) Asset Tool
Displays the number of assets in the NFT-bound account

ERC-6551 enables each NFT to have its own Wallet (TBA). When the NFT is traded, the ownership of the assets in the attached Wallet is also transferred. If you are unfamiliar with ERC-6551, you likely do not need to install this plugin.

ZAKKU is a TBA tool developed by 6551.XYZ. It allows the OpenSea page to display whether each NFT has deployed a TBA and provides a list of existing assets in TBAs, whether deployed or not.
